summary.span: Provides enumeration support for and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字型家族是一組具有相同的字樣，新細明體，例如，但其不同功能的字型。A font family is a set of fonts that have the same typeface, such as Arial, but that differ in features. 這些功能的差異包括，例如斜體、 和，例如粗體。These feature differences include , such as italic, and , such as bold. ![字型](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "字型")![Fonts](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Fonts") "Times New Roman"的字型家族成員的字樣的範例Example of typefaces that are "Times New Roman" font family members
